<static> append_semi_stiff_cam(obj, target, offset, rotation_offset, clamp_left, clamp_right, clamp_up, clamp_down)

Append semi-stiff constraint with camera rotation clamping.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
obj Object ID
target Object ID or [Armature object ID, Bone Name]
offset vec3 Offset in parent local space
rotation_offset quat4 <optional>
 Rotation offset in parent local space
clamp_left Clamp camera rotation left for azimuth angle
clamp_right Clamp camera rotation right for azimuth angle
clamp_up Clamp camera rotation up for elevation angle
clamp_down Clamp camera rotation down for elevation angle
